item.title: About
item.description:
A comet searching for its destiny

Who am I?

My full name is Dang Minh Nhut (Dang is my last name, and Nhut is my first name). I am from Vietnam. Currently, I am a senior student majoring in Computer Science, currently researching in Natural Language Processing. I have four years of experience in Competitive Programming. Besides that, Iâ€™m also interested in photography, music, and manga.
